description: This is not just a cycling event for cyclists - it will demonstrate to everyone, young and old, those who have never cycled or haven't cycled in years, that this is a great option for getting around London. The afternoon of celebrations will involve

texts: Transport for London will be hosting BikeFest in the Square, a dynamic cycling festival and a flagship event for Bike Week 2004.

This is not just a cycling event for cyclists - it will demonstrate to everyone, young and old, those who have never cycled or haven't cycled in years, that this is a great option for getting around London.
The afternoon of celebrations will involve bike-themed entertainment and activities including:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["A large central screen and stage providing a focus for the afternoons activities with cycling footage and special guests","Junk funk band Weapons of Sound, instruments created from bicycle parts","The Half Pipe Show - a spectacular BMX stunt bike show","Roving street theatre performances","A cycle art zone","An area where members of the public can learn to ride a bike or try out a tandem, recumbent bike or crazy bike","Bollywood on Bikes - a choreographed dance piece with all the glamour and allure of Bollywood","LifeCycle themed stalls area - wide range of information on cycling in London."]}
For more information, contact: Transport for London press office on 020 7941 4141
